tool_description: Get current currency exchange rates for over all currencies.
title: CurrencyAPI

api_list.name: Cripto
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currencyapi1.p.rapidapi.com/cripto"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currencyapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
